attributes.action: We the undersigned petition HM Gov. to initiate Article 50 immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Article 50 is the clause in EU treaty that can only be triggered by a country wishing to leave the EU.  Once triggered it will start the process of an organised withdrawal from the European Union with a deadline of 2 years to ratify the withdrawal.
attributes.background: We are concerned that a future Conservative or Labour Government may listen to calls for a 2nd referendum and we urge the Prime Minister to uphold the will of the majority of British people by immediately initiating Article 50.
